html:
3.20.20  6:53 pm   I'd like to make a prediction: You don't have a specific date in mind, but you want to keep working on it until you are done with it and happy with it, which will take... a handful of weeks. I mean, the only reason people give release dates is for marketing purposes, right? You seem like an explicitly anti-sellout person, which is pretty cool

Is that too broad, or can I guess that

     no, it's different, it's kind of like being in an emergency and not having enough resources to solve the emergency

3.20.20  6:50 pm   when we die do we transfer to another being or do we go into a different universe

     extremely both. i think that's obvious

3.20.20  6:33 pm   How do you develop a song?

     it's kind of like playing doctor. or sometimes you can get really lucky and the song treats itself. when it does, it usually happens very quickly

     Do you have an idea and flesh it out?

     i don't know what flesh it out means but it sounds kinda gross actually

     Do you write on piano or guitar or any other way.

     i use a keyboard, always set to the same sound. the playing sound (or 'writing' sound). i also use text and audio recordings to keep a clear documentation of how it is supposed to go

     Do you have a set chord progression.

     when things are working best, the melody lyric and chord have an unbreakable symbiotic bond with each other

3.20.20  6:21 pm   WHY DO PEOPLE INSIST ON GROUPING SONGS INTO GENRES? AND WHY DO PEOPLE INSIST THAT MUSIC MUST CONFORM TO SAID GENRE????

     a timeless game of cat and mouse

3.20.20  6:20 pm   If you had a song that's already finished, but for some non-specified reason you couldn't finish the music video, and realise its gonna take you a lot to finish it properly, would you release the song without a music video, and then finish it, or would you wait till you had the video done to release both parts? If so, why?

     new song and video at the same time makes for a much stronger release

3.20.20  6:17 pm   what are your strategies for losing

     hm, how about this

3.20.20  6:04 pm   Am I going to be okay?

     [calculating] Yes

3.20.20  5:52 pm   have you ever wanted to live an epic romance story not for the romance but for the story?

     don't we all

3.20.20  5:33 pm   you are god. how do we worship

     oh no i'm not falling for that one

3.20.20  5:29 pm   how do i live

     hold on, i can explain

3.20.20  4:50 pm   Are you excited?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.20.20  4:38 pm   why do you not use capital letters

     i do, but why don't you

3.20.20  4:24 pm   Is a cow a duck?

     oh that would explain a lot

3.20.20  4:09 pm   What's the best odd time signature?

     3

3.20.20  4:01 pm   do you have an "oh that would explain a lot" button?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.20.20  4:00 pm   what is your favorite word

     polk

3.20.20  3:33 pm   how do you balance

     i changed my mind

3.20.20  3:26 pm   how can I be sure that my thoughts aren't being implanted in my mind by an external intelligence?

     if they are then congratulations, you are that external intelligence

3.20.20  3:17 pm   what is the video you most enjoyed making

     i would prefer to make a new one to enjoy making the most

3.20.20  3:09 pm   When will you update 

     i'm having a countdown timer

3.20.20  2:54 pm   why are your vids so good?

     could be some type of conspiracy

3.20.20  2:39 pm   does art matter?

     i dare you to try it and see

3.20.20  2:32 pm   why is bread called bread

     that's the sound you make when you break it apart

3.20.20  2:29 pm   what are your thoughts on egg?

     meh

3.20.20  2:23 pm   Which hour is the best?

     2:23 pm

3.20.20  2:23 pm   How do you motivate yourself to do things that you have to do? Or do you?

     sometimes i wonder how to do the things i am motivated to do

3.20.20  2:15 pm   How is school

     never heard of it

3.20.20  2:14 pm   Making and listening to music cure my mind, devastated and suffered from my life. Did you also started to make musics because of this?

     no but that's a great reason

      cause I've seen some of your answers telling that you weren't really

3.20.20  2:13 pm   What are you're thoughts on covid 19

     plot twist

3.20.20  2:13 pm   be you life still?

     oh yes, that makes sense

3.20.20  2:11 pm   2020 thoughts?

     ask me again when the shock wears off

3.20.20  2:05 pm   social distancing is boring.

     not as boring as being in an over crowded hospital

     are you bored?

     no

3.20.20  2:05 pm   I'm quite enjoying this whole social distancing thing. Do you think some of us introverts have been practicing for this for our whole lives?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.20.20  2:05 pm   can u help

     i think so

3.20.20  2:02 pm   what happens if an immovable object meets an unstoppable force

     they have to go to court

3.20.20  1:58 pm   is making something louder zooming in with sound

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.20.20  1:51 pm   are you an extraterrestrial being?

     no

3.20.20  1:49 pm   thoughts on existing

     seems like it must be a sin

3.20.20  1:45 pm   how to like someone you hate?

     the best way is to like everybody

3.20.20  1:25 pm   april 23 i think ur coming out of ur shell and back to youtube

     hm, that sounds pretty tasty

3.20.20  1:17 pm   are you working on a big project?

     yes

     when you worked on the history of the world it took you over a year.

     that's not true, it took a little less than a year

      so are you working on a huge video?

     no

3.20.20  1:16 pm   do you believe in normal?

     yes but i can't prove it

3.20.20  1:08 pm   Your music is wonderful! Although I hope you aren't feeling pressured to upload anything immediately.

     i am feeling that way, but i also have a strongly pre-established agenda to re-invent the entire wheel

      Please take your time, stay safe and happy. Also, how are you?

     ok

3.20.20  12:53 pm   how to eat pie?????/?/

     i have no idea

3.20.20  12:53 pm   thoughts on italy?

     they are the exact center of the world

3.20.20  12:22 pm   Do you think that the very long answers you sometimes give on this page reflect the long videos you sometimes make?

     you'll have to read them and find out

3.20.20  12:20 pm   opinion of cringe?

     it makes a good breakfast cereal

3.20.20  12:17 pm   Are you a newspaper?

     no

3.20.20  12:16 pm   how do you answer these questions

     impossible. it can't be done

3.20.20  12:02 pm   Do you like rollercoasters?

     no but i appreciate the concept
